resources.array:
//Truths - Kids (testArray2)
What is your least favorite thing about family gatherings?
What is one thing that makes you relax?
What is a bad habit that you have?
Have you ever lied about being sick so you could stay home from school?
If anyone in your family could win an award for the most annoying, who would it be?
What is the most embarrassing thing that has happened to you in front of a crowd?
What was the worst gift you ever received?
What is the one thing you are the most afraid of?
Have you ever cheated on a test?
What are your favorite pizza toppings?
If you were granted three wishes, what would you wish for?
What is something you find to be disgusting?
Who was your favorite teacher in school?
What makes you furious?
If you were invisible what is something you would do?
What was the name of your first crush?
What is your biggest fear?
If you could be someone else for a day who would you be?
Who is the person you are the most jealous of and why?
What’s your biggest regret?
What’s one thing you would do if you waked up tomorrow as a bird?
Have you ever peed in a pool?
What do you hate and why?
Who/what is someone/something that annoys you?
What’s the worst thing that’s ever happened to you?
When was the last time you cried and why?
If you could live anywhere, where would it be?
What’s the last thing you searched on your phone?
What is one embarrassing fact your friends should know about you?
Do you believe in love at first sight?
How do you feel about end pieces of a loaf of bread?
What is the weirdest dream you’ve had?
Do you cover your eyes during a scary part in a movie?
Do you pick your nose?
Do you sleep with a stuffed animal?
Who do you like the least in this room and why?
Do you ever admire yourself in the mirror?
What would you do with $1,000?
If you could be any celebrity, who would you be and why?
What is the least favorite gift you’ve ever received?
Do you keep a diary/journal?
Have you ever lied about your age?
What is the grossest thing you’ve done today?
Have you ever cried during a movie?
What is something you wish you were better at?
Have you ever broken something and blamed someone else?
When was the last time you did something nice for someone else?
Have you ever eaten a bug?
Have you ever passed gas and blamed someone else?
If you were marooned on an island with just a single person, who would you like it to be?
If you woke up one day and notice that you are invisible, then what will be the first thing you would like to do?
What was the nastiest joke you ever played on someone?
If you could have anything in the world, what would it be?
What do you like the most about everyone in the room?
Have you ever lied to a teacher and what was it about?
What’s the dumbest thing you ever said or did, around someone you liked?
What was your most embarrassing farting moment?
Would you rather have a pet, or a sibling?
Which are the funniest words you know?
If Aladdin’s genie were to visit you, what would be your three wishes?
What would be your new name, if you were allowed to choose one?
When was the last time you were bored out of your brains?
What is your secret superpower?
If you get hold of a time machine, ’when’ would you like to go?
Who is your best friend in the whole wide world?
Have you cheated to win a game?
What is one annoying habit of each person in the room?
Worst grade you ever got on a paper?
Most embarrassing thing anyone has ever said to you?
Have you fallen asleep in class?
Do you sleep with a nightlight?
Did you brush your teeth this morning?
Have you ever walked in your sleep?
